content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253792,"originalJapaneseLine":"デートしようぜと誘うが、私は今から美樹様と会うといい出て行く","translatedEnglishLine":"I invite her to go on a date, but she says she's going to meet Lady Miki now and leaves."},{"lineNumber":253793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":253794,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとホーネット、玉座","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and Hornet, the throne."},{"lineNumber":253795,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹ちゃんと会ったのか、美樹ちゃんは魔王になってくれなかっただろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Did you meet Miki-chan? Miki-chan didn’t agree to become the Demon King, did she?"},{"lineNumber":253796,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・いつまでも待ちます、かならず分かってくれるはずです","translatedEnglishLine":"...I will wait forever; she is sure to understand."},{"lineNumber":253797,"originalJapaneseLine":"前王ガイの遺言を守るのが私の役目うんぬん、堅物、平行線","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s my duty to uphold the late King Guy’s will and such—stubborn, at an impasse."},{"lineNumber":253798,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ケイブリスが美樹を狙っている、世界を狙っている、これだけは防がねばいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Cavebris is targeting Miki, targeting the world. This alone must be prevented."},{"lineNumber":253799,"originalJapaneseLine":"当面は行動を共にさせて頂きます、よろしくお願いしますと","translatedEnglishLine":"For the time being, I will accompany you; please take care of me."},{"lineNumber":253800,"originalJapaneseLine":"なら俺達はもっと知り合わねばいけない、とベッドに誘うが断られる","translatedEnglishLine":"Then we must get to know each other better, I invite her to bed, but I am refused."},{"lineNumber":253801,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしたらやらしてくれるんだーとだだをこねるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance whines, 'What do I have to do to get you to let me?'"},{"lineNumber":253802,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹様が魔王に付いて頂けたら私はもう何も要りません、あたなにこの身を差し出してもよいです","translatedEnglishLine":"If Lady Miki agrees to be the Demon King, I need nothing more. I am willing to offer myself to you."},{"lineNumber":253803,"originalJapaneseLine":"うう・・それは無理そうだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... that seems impossible."},{"lineNumber":253804,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだ、ケイブリスだ、ケイブリスを俺が退治したら抱かせろ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's right, Cavebris. If I defeat Cavebris, let me hold you."},{"lineNumber":253805,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・ケイブリスがいなくなれば１番の心配毎がなくなります。わかりましたと","translatedEnglishLine":"...If Cavebris disappears, the biggest worry will be gone. Understood."},{"lineNumber":253806,"originalJapaneseLine":"やったーと喜ぶランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance rejoices, 'Yay!'"},{"lineNumber":253807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　ここにはサテラはいません","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is not here."},{"lineNumber":253808,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットの部屋、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet's room."},{"lineNumber":253809,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットから先程のランスとの約束を聞き怒る、あいつ私の使徒の立場でなんて失礼な事を","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet hears about the promise with Rance and gets angry, 'How rude of him to say such things while in my apostle's position!'"},{"lineNumber":253810,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな約束撤回させてきます。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will make him revoke that promise."},{"lineNumber":253811,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、よい。どうせ無理な事だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it’s fine. It’s impossible anyway."},{"lineNumber":253812,"originalJapaneseLine":"あのケイブリスを人間がどうのこうの出来るはずがない、私が力を回復してからその時に倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s no way humans can do anything to that Cavebris. I’ll regain my strength and defeat him then."},{"lineNumber":253813,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラもその時は協力してくれよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera, please cooperate at that time."},{"lineNumber":253814,"originalJapaneseLine":"もちろんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course."},{"lineNumber":253815,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラはランスの悪口をいっぱい言う、あいつは・・使徒失格だ、クビにしようかな、バカだしエロだし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera says many bad things about Rance: 'He’s unfit as an apostle, maybe I’ll fire him. He’s stupid and perverted...'"},{"lineNumber":253816,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうだな、人間という種の限界ゆえしかたないとはいえ、あの男は特別に下品だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s right, it can’t be helped due to the limitations of the human race, but that man is exceptionally vulgar."},{"lineNumber":253817,"originalJapaneseLine":"力はあるが、頭は悪い、考えも無しぽい、快楽行為ばかりで後先考えていないようだ、どうしてあのような男が人類のリーダーなのか","translatedEnglishLine":"He has strength but is dumb, seems thoughtless, indulges only in pleasures without thinking ahead. Why is such a man humanity’s leader?"},{"lineNumber":253818,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこまで言われるとなんか腹がたってきた（ランスは私の使徒、特別な感情を持ちだしていたので）","translatedEnglishLine":"Hearing that much, I somehow got angry (Because Rance is my apostle, I had developed special feelings for him)."},{"lineNumber":253819,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ、そこまで言わなくても・・あれはあれでいい所もあるんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, you don’t have to say that much... he does have good points in his own way."},{"lineNumber":253820,"originalJapaneseLine":"決断力もあるし、頼りになる時も・・","translatedEnglishLine":"He has decisiveness and can be reliable sometimes..."},{"lineNumber":253821,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、安心してよいぞ、私はサテラの使徒を取ったりなんかしないから","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that so? Then rest assured, I would never take away Satera’s apostle."},{"lineNumber":253822,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、そういう意味じゃないですと","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh? That’s not what I meant."},{"lineNumber":253823,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっとだけ女子友達ぽい会話でもいいかも","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe a little chat like girl friends would be nice."},{"lineNumber":253824,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tRance Castle"},{"lineNumber":253825,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケイブリスについての情報、過去、性格","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tInformation about Cavebris: past and personality."},{"lineNumber":253826,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t倒したら抱けるという約束の再確認","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tReconfirmation of the promise that if defeated, he can embrace robots."},{"lineNumber":253847,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこまでに殺されていない場合です","translatedEnglishLine":"If they have not been killed by then."},{"lineNumber":253848,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた","translatedEnglishLine":"He was called and came here for Camilla’s birthday."},{"lineNumber":253849,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"A battle ensues."},{"lineNumber":253850,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t少し休憩","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tA short rest."},{"lineNumber":253851,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tサテラがガーディアン造り","translatedEnglishLine":"\t\tSatera is building a guardian."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デートしようぜと誘うが、私は今から美樹様と会うといい出て行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I invite her to go on a date, but she says she's going to meet Lady Miki now and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとホーネット、玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Hornet, the throne.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんと会ったのか、美樹ちゃんは魔王になってくれなかっただろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you meet Miki-chan? Miki-chan didn’t agree to become the Demon King, did she?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・いつまでも待ちます、かならず分かってくれるはずです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I will wait forever; she is sure to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前王ガイの遺言を守るのが私の役目うんぬん、堅物、平行線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s my duty to uphold the late King Guy’s will and such—stubborn, at an impasse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスが美樹を狙っている、世界を狙っている、これだけは防がねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Cavebris is targeting Miki, targeting the world. This alone must be prevented.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当面は行動を共にさせて頂きます、よろしくお願いしますと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the time being, I will accompany you; please take care of me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら俺達はもっと知り合わねばいけない、とベッドに誘うが断られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then we must get to know each other better, I invite her to bed, but I am refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたらやらしてくれるんだーとだだをこねるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance whines, 'What do I have to do to get you to let me?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹様が魔王に付いて頂けたら私はもう何も要りません、あたなにこの身を差し出してもよいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Lady Miki agrees to be the Demon King, I need nothing more. I am willing to offer myself to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう・・それは無理そうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... that seems impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、ケイブリスだ、ケイブリスを俺が退治したら抱かせろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, Cavebris. If I defeat Cavebris, let me hold you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・ケイブリスがいなくなれば１番の心配毎がなくなります。わかりましたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...If Cavebris disappears, the biggest worry will be gone. Understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったーと喜ぶランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance rejoices, 'Yay!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにはサテラはいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is not here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの部屋、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットから先程のランスとの約束を聞き怒る、あいつ私の使徒の立場でなんて失礼な事を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet hears about the promise with Rance and gets angry, 'How rude of him to say such things while in my apostle's position!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな約束撤回させてきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will make him revoke that promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、よい。どうせ無理な事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it’s fine. It’s impossible anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのケイブリスを人間がどうのこうの出来るはずがない、私が力を回復してからその時に倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no way humans can do anything to that Cavebris. I’ll regain my strength and defeat him then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラもその時は協力してくれよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, please cooperate at that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはランスの悪口をいっぱい言う、あいつは・・使徒失格だ、クビにしようかな、バカだしエロだし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera says many bad things about Rance: 'He’s unfit as an apostle, maybe I’ll fire him. He’s stupid and perverted...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、人間という種の限界ゆえしかたないとはいえ、あの男は特別に下品だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, it can’t be helped due to the limitations of the human race, but that man is exceptionally vulgar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力はあるが、頭は悪い、考えも無しぽい、快楽行為ばかりで後先考えていないようだ、どうしてあのような男が人類のリーダーなのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has strength but is dumb, seems thoughtless, indulges only in pleasures without thinking ahead. Why is such a man humanity’s leader?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで言われるとなんか腹がたってきた（ランスは私の使徒、特別な感情を持ちだしていたので）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hearing that much, I somehow got angry (Because Rance is my apostle, I had developed special feelings for him).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、そこまで言わなくても・・あれはあれでいい所もあるんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, you don’t have to say that much... he does have good points in his own way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決断力もあるし、頼りになる時も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has decisiveness and can be reliable sometimes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、安心してよいぞ、私はサテラの使徒を取ったりなんかしないから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that so? Then rest assured, I would never take away Satera’s apostle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、そういう意味じゃないですと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh? That’s not what I meant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとだけ女子友達ぽい会話でもいいかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe a little chat like girl friends would be nice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスについての情報、過去、性格
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information about Cavebris: past and personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒したら抱けるという約束の再確認
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reconfirmation of the promise that if defeated, he can embrace her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの居場所が分かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have found Cavebris’s location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生会には参加する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Participate in Camilla’s birthday party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正面突破を決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Determined to break through the front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノラインに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Maginot Line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから魔物界に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering the monster world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、誕生パーティの準備中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, preparations for the birthday party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間達が侵入して来た事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They learn that humans have invaded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍で迎撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full-scale counterattack by the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無数の敵と遭遇中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encountering countless enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continuing onward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maerita’s squad appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットとランスの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Hornet and Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人メディウサが現れます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Medusa appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they have not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was called and came here for Camilla’s birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人パイアールが現れます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Paiar appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自身が戦うというより部下のロボ達を引き連れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than fighting himself, he brings along his subordinate robots.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they have not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was called and came here for Camilla’s birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A short rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがガーディアン造り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is building a guardian.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Why is such a man humanity’s leader?"},{"lineNumber":253818,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこまで言われるとなんか腹がたってきた（ランスは私の使徒、特別な感情を持ちだしていたので）","translatedEnglishLine":"Hearing that much, I somehow got angry (Because Rance is my apostle, I had developed special feelings for him)."},{"lineNumber":253819,"originalJapaneseLine":"いえ、そこまで言わなくても・・あれはあれでいい所もあるんです。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, you don’t have to say that much... he does have good points in his own way."},{"lineNumber":253820,"originalJapaneseLine":"決断力もあるし、頼りになる時も・・","translatedEnglishLine":"He has decisiveness and can be reliable sometimes..."},{"lineNumber":253821,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうか、安心してよいぞ、私はサテラの使徒を取ったりなんかしないから","translatedEnglishLine":"Is that so? translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: デートしようぜと誘うが、私は今から美樹様と会うといい出て行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I invite her to go on a date, but she says she's going to meet Lady Miki now and leaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとホーネット、玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Hornet, the throne.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹ちゃんと会ったのか、美樹ちゃんは魔王になってくれなかっただろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you meet Miki-chan? Miki-chan didn’t agree to become the Demon King, did she?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・いつまでも待ちます、かならず分かってくれるはずです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I will wait forever; she is sure to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前王ガイの遺言を守るのが私の役目うんぬん、堅物、平行線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s my duty to uphold the late King Guy’s will and such—stubborn, at an impasse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスが美樹を狙っている、世界を狙っている、これだけは防がねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Cavebris is targeting Miki, targeting the world. This alone must be prevented.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当面は行動を共にさせて頂きます、よろしくお願いしますと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For the time being, I will accompany you; please take care of me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら俺達はもっと知り合わねばいけない、とベッドに誘うが断られる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then we must get to know each other better, I invite her to bed, but I am refused.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたらやらしてくれるんだーとだだをこねるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance whines, 'What do I have to do to get you to let me?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹様が魔王に付いて頂けたら私はもう何も要りません、あたなにこの身を差し出してもよいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Lady Miki agrees to be the Demon King, I need nothing more. I am willing to offer myself to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう・・それは無理そうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... that seems impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、ケイブリスだ、ケイブリスを俺が退治したら抱かせろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, Cavebris. If I defeat Cavebris, let me hold you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・ケイブリスがいなくなれば１番の心配毎がなくなります。わかりましたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...If Cavebris disappears, the biggest worry will be gone. Understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったーと喜ぶランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance rejoices, 'Yay!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここにはサテラはいません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is not here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの部屋、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet's room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットから先程のランスとの約束を聞き怒る、あいつ私の使徒の立場でなんて失礼な事を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet hears about the promise with Rance and gets angry, 'How rude of him to say such things while in my apostle's position!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな約束撤回させてきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will make him revoke that promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、よい。どうせ無理な事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it’s fine. It’s impossible anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのケイブリスを人間がどうのこうの出来るはずがない、私が力を回復してからその時に倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s no way humans can do anything to that Cavebris. I’ll regain my strength and defeat him then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラもその時は協力してくれよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera, please cooperate at that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはランスの悪口をいっぱい言う、あいつは・・使徒失格だ、クビにしようかな、バカだしエロだし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera says many bad things about Rance: 'He’s unfit as an apostle, maybe I’ll fire him. He’s stupid and perverted...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、人間という種の限界ゆえしかたないとはいえ、あの男は特別に下品だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s right, it can’t be helped due to the limitations of the human race, but that man is exceptionally vulgar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力はあるが、頭は悪い、考えも無しぽい、快楽行為ばかりで後先考えていないようだ、どうしてあのような男が人類のリーダーなのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has strength but is dumb, seems thoughtless, indulges only in pleasures without thinking ahead. Why is such a man humanity’s leader?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで言われるとなんか腹がたってきた（ランスは私の使徒、特別な感情を持ちだしていたので）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hearing that much, I somehow got angry (Because Rance is my apostle, I had developed special feelings for him).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、そこまで言わなくても・・あれはあれでいい所もあるんです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, you don’t have to say that much... he does have good points in his own way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決断力もあるし、頼りになる時も・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He has decisiveness and can be reliable sometimes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、安心してよいぞ、私はサテラの使徒を取ったりなんかしないから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is that so? Then rest assured, I would never take away Satera’s apostle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、そういう意味じゃないですと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh? That’s not what I meant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとだけ女子友達ぽい会話でもいいかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe a little chat like girl friends would be nice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスについての情報、過去、性格
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Information about Cavebris: past and personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒したら抱けるという約束の再確認
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reconfirmation of the promise that if defeated, he can embrace her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの居場所が分かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have found Cavebris’s location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生会には参加する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Participate in Camilla’s birthday party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正面突破を決意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Determined to break through the front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノラインに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Maginot Line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これから魔物界に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Entering the monster world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、誕生パーティの準備中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, preparations for the birthday party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間達が侵入して来た事を知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They learn that humans have invaded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全軍で迎撃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full-scale counterattack by the army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無数の敵と遭遇中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encountering countless enemies.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continuing onward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maerita’s squad appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットとランスの会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Hornet and Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人メディウサが現れます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Medusa appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they have not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was called and came here for Camilla’s birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の前に魔人パイアールが現れます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Paiar appears before Rance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自身が戦うというより部下のロボ達を引き連れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than fighting himself, he brings along his subordinate robots.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでに殺されていない場合です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they have not been killed by then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラの誕生日に呼ばれてこちらに来ていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was called and came here for Camilla’s birthday.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し休憩
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A short rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがガーディアン造り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is building a guardian.
